mapper.select: SELECT * FROM subject AS t1 JOIN (SELECT ROUND(RAND() * (SELECT MAX(subjectid) FROM subject)) AS id) AS t2 WHERE t1.subjectid >= t2.id AND carexam=#{carexam} AND cartype=#{cartype} LIMIT 1

SELECT subjectid,content,info,subjecttype,subjectselect,answer,grade, (CASE carexam WHEN '1' THEN '科目一'WHEN '2' THEN '科目二' WHEN '3' THEN '科目三'WHEN '4' THEN '科目四' END)carexam , cartype FROM subject
content like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')

SELECT a.subjectid,a.content,a.info,a.subjecttype,a.subjectselect,a.answer,a.grade, (CASE a.carexam WHEN '1' THEN '科目一'WHEN '2' THEN '科目二' WHEN '3' THEN '科目三'WHEN '4' THEN '科目四' END)carexam , cartype FROM subject a,user_error b WHERE b.userid=#{userId} AND b.subjectid=a.subjectid
AND a.content like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')

SELECT a.subjectid,a.content,a.info,a.subjecttype,a.subjectselect,a.answer,a.grade, (CASE a.carexam WHEN '1' THEN '科目一'WHEN '2' THEN '科目二' WHEN '3' THEN '科目三'WHEN '4' THEN '科目四' END)carexam , cartype FROM subject a,user_collect b WHERE b.userid=#{userId} AND b.subjectid=a.subjectid
AND a.content like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
